message.content:
cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.AR, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the use of a virtual machine for software verification, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The use of LLVM IR and hypercalls suggests a focus on programming languages and compilers (cs.PL). The implementation of a small operating system and POSIX compatibility suggests a focus on operating systems and networks (cs.LO). The comparison with a traditional LLVM model checker suggests a focus on automated reasoning (cs.AR). Finally, the use of a virtual machine as a backend for verification suggests a focus on systems and control (cs.SY).
